trans-unit.source: Provides static methods used to draw user interface elements on activity designer surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos estáticos usados para desenhar os elementos da interface do usuário nas superfícies de designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Draws a 3-dimensional button on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um botão 3-dimensional na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the 3-dimensional button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na qual desenhar o botão 3-dimensional.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para desenhar o botão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites do botão.

trans-unit.source: The single-precision floating-point number to specify the transparency level of the button.
trans-unit.target: O número de ponto flutuante de precisão simples para especificar o nível de transparência do botão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref> enumeration value to specify the appearance of the button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref> valor de enumeração para especificar a aparência do botão.

trans-unit.source: graphics contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: graphicscontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Draws a button that is used to expand and collapse composite designers on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um botão que é usado para expandir e recolher o designer de compostos na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na qual desenhar o botão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites do botão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw an expanded button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para desenhar um botão expandido. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the activity designer used to render the button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"> </xref> associada com o designer de atividade usado para renderizar o botão.

trans-unit.source: graphics or compositeDesignerTheme contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: graphicsou compositeDesignerTheme contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, and a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma imagem na superfície do designer de atividade usando um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, uma <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>, um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>e um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use this version of DrawImage, the source rectangle is set to the size, in pixels, of the image, the transparency setting is set to 1.0f, and drawing grayscales is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usar esta versão do DrawImage, o retângulo de origem é definido como o tamanho, em pixels, da imagem, a configuração de transparência é definida como 1, 0F e escalas de cinza de desenho não é permitido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na qual desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites da imagem para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref> que especifica como a imagem é alinhada no retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: graphics, image, or destination contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: graphics, image, ou destination contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, a source and destination <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>, a single-precision floating-point number, and a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma imagem na superfície do designer de atividade usando um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, uma <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>, uma origem e destino <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, uma <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref>, um número de ponto flutuante de precisão simples e um valor booleano.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na qual desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the image.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the source of the image.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define a origem da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref> que especifica como a imagem é alinhada no retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that defines the transparency settings for the image.
trans-unit.target: Um número de ponto flutuante de precisão simples que define as configurações de transparência da imagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw the image in grayscales; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para desenhar a imagem em escalas de cinza; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: graphics, image, destination, or source contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: graphics, image, destination, ou source contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or- transparency is less than 0, or greater than 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: - ou - transparency é menor do que 0 ou maior que 1, 0F.

trans-unit.source: Draws a rounded rectangle on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um retângulo arredondado na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: DrawRoundedRectangle uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> method to obtain the path to draw.
trans-unit.target: DrawRoundedRectangle usa o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A>método para obter o caminho para desenhar.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na qual desenhar o retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to draw the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> para desenhar o retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the rounded rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites do retângulo arredondado.

trans-unit.source: The integer value of the radius to use for the rounded edges.
trans-unit.target: O valor de inteiro do radius a ser usado para as bordas arredondadas.

trans-unit.source: graphics or drawingPen contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: graphicsou drawingPen contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Draws text on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha texto na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to draw the text
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> usado para desenhar o texto

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the text must be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O delimitador <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual o texto deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> that specifies where the text is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> que especifica onde o texto é alinhado no retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality"></xref> that specifies the quality setting to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality"> </xref> que especifica a configuração de qualidade para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: graphics, font, text, or textBrush contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: graphics, font, text, ou textBrush contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns the graphics path used to draw the specified rounded rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o caminho do gráfico usado para desenhar o retângulo arredondado especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method uses GetRoundedRectanglePath to obtain the path to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A>método usa GetRoundedRectanglePath para obter o caminho para desenhar.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> for which to obtain the graphics path.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para a qual obter o caminho de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: An integer that defines the radius to use to draw the rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que define o raio a ser usado para desenhar os cantos arredondados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that draws the rounded path of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> que desenha o caminho arredondado do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: rectangle is set to .
trans-unit.target: rectangleé definido como .

trans-unit.source: -- or -- radius is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: – ou – radius é menor ou igual a 0.
